/home/cosimo/Documenti/clion-2018.1.1/bin/cmake/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/usr/bin/clang -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/usr/bin/clang++ -G "CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles" /home/cosimo/Documenti/ProgrammiC++/A-star
